io.github.robolib.module.hid

Class XBoxController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.robolib.module.hid.GenericHID
      • io.github.robolib.module.hid.Joystick
        • io.github.robolib.module.hid.XBoxController

  • public final class XBoxController
extends Joystick
    A better Joystick implementation for the XBox Controller.
    Author:
    noriah Reuland

      • getLeftDirectionDegrees

        public double getLeftDirectionDegrees()
        Get the direction of the vector formed by the left stick and its origin in degrees uses acos(-1) to represent Pi due to absence of readily accessable Pi constant in C++
